pages.text: This farm automatically shears the $(l:creatures/animal-sheep)$(thing)Sheep$() by testing with an $(l:redstone/redstone_components#observer)$(item)Observer$() if the $(l:creatures/animal-sheep)$(thing)Sheep$() have grown new $(item)Wool$() from eating the $(item)Grass$() block. $(br2)It's important that there are still additional $(item)Grass$() blocks to let the $(item)Dirt$() grow back.
